title: When patch 6.9 comes around...
body:
I can only pray that we finally get a set of SEXY Pool Party skins, either announced or released with that patch.

I'm talking about stuff like the following:

Lifeguard Sivir, who throws a life preserver and wears the typical lifeguard red one-piece.
Miss Fortune in a bikini wielding super soakers
Vayne in a one-piece with a fishy crossbow
Sona with beach attire and a floating DJ box with a tropical theme

I know it's technically too early for summer, but the patch number makes this too convenient to pass up.
